name: Ex Libro Orbis
description:
~~ controller recommended | please use speakers or headphones ~~

this small game was made in a week for Godot Wild Jam 44.  The theme was FRAGILE

Ex Libro Orbis is a ~10 minute 3d platformer / marble game.  You play a wizard's orb, trapped inside a strange dimension.  Severed from your wizard, you are very fragile, but you must persist and find a way out of this prison!


Controls:  (note: in-game tutorial messages / button prompts are for xbox controller)

Controller (Recommended):

Left Stick = Move              Right stick = Rotate Camera
Y Button = Interact                       A button = Jump

Keyboard:

WASD = Move                 Arrow Keys = Rotate Camera

E = Interact                      Space Bar = Jump
